name: FAudioSliderStyle
doc: Represents the appearance of an Audio Slider

SliderStyle: The style to use for the underlying SSlider.
TextBoxStyle: The style to use for the audio text box widget.
SliderBackgroundColor: Color used to draw the slider background
SliderBackgroundSize: Size of the slider background (slider default is vertical)
LabelPadding: Size of the padding between the label and the slider
SliderBarColor: Color used to draw the slider bar
SliderThumbColor: Color used to draw the slider thumb (handle)
WidgetBackgroundColor: Color used to draw the widget background
